Verses: 1 dhevanaagiya Karththar Undaakkina Sagala Kaattu Jeevangalaippaarkkilum Sarppamaanadhu Thandhiramulladhaayirundhadhu. Adhu Sthreeyai Nokki: Neengal Thottaththilulla Sagala Virutchangalin Kaniyaiyum Pusikkavendaam Endru Dhevan Sonnadhu Undo Endradhu.
2 sthree Sarppaththaip Paarththu: Naangal Thottaththilulla Virutchangalin Kanigalaip Pusikkalaam;
3 aanaalum, Thottaththin Naduvil Irukkira Virutchaththin Kaniyaik Kuriththu, Dhevan: Neengal Saagaadhapadikku Adhaip Pusikkavum Adhaith Thodavum Vendaam Endru Sonnaar Endraal.
4 appozhudhu Sarppam Sthreeyai Nokki: Neengal Saagave Saavadhillai;
5 neengal Idhaip Pusikkum Naalile Ungal Kangal Thirakkappadum Endrum, Neengal Nanmai Theemai Arindhu Dhevargalaippol Iruppeergal Endrum Dhevan Arivaar Endradhu.

6 appozhudhu Sthreeyaanaval, Andha Virutcham Pusippukku Nalladhum, Paarvaikku Inbamum, Buththiyaith Thelivikkiradharku Ichchikkappadaththakka Virutchamumaai Irukkiradhu Endru Kandu, Adhin Kaniyaip Pariththu, Pusiththu, Than Purushanukkum Koduththaal; Avanum Pusiththaan.
7 appozhudhu Avargal Iruvarudaiya Kangalum Thirakkappattadhu; Avargal Thaangal Nirvaanigal Endru Arindhu, Aththiyilaigalaith Thaiththu, Thangalukku Araikkachchaigalai Undupanninaargal.

8 pagalil Kulirchchiyaana Velaiyile Thottaththil Ulaavugira Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Saththaththai Avargal Kettaargal. Appozhudhu Aadhaamum Avan Manaiviyum Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Sannidhikku Vilagi, Thottaththin Virutchangalukkulle Oliththukkondaargal.
9 appozhudhu Dhevanaagiya Karththar Aadhaamaik Kooppittu: Nee Enge Irukkiraai Endraar.
10 adharku Avan: Naan Dhevareerudaiya Saththaththaith Thottaththile Kettu, Naan Nirvaaniyaayiruppadhinaal Bayandhu, Oliththukkonden Endraan.
11 appozhudhu Avar: Nee Nirvaani Endru Unakku Ariviththavan Yaar? Pusikkavendaam Endru Naan Unakku Vilakkina Virutchaththin Kaniyaip Pusiththaayo Endraar.
12 adharku Aadhaam: Ennudane Irukkumpadi Dhevareer Thandha Sthreeyaanaval Avvirutchaththin Kaniyai Enakkuk Koduththaal, Naan Pusiththen Endraan.
13 appozhudhu Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sthreeyai Nokki: Nee Ippadi Seydhadhu Enna Endraar. Sthreeyaanaval: Sarppam Ennai Vanjiththadhu, Naan Pusiththen Endraal.

14 appozhudhu Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sarppaththaip Paarththu: Nee Idhai Seydhapadiyaal Sagala Naattumirugangalilum Sagala Kaattumirugangalilum Sabikkappattiruppaai, Nee Un Vayitrinaal Nagarndhu, Uyirodirukkum Naalellaam Mannaith Thinbaai;
15 unakkum Sthreekkum, Un Viththukkum Aval Viththukkum Pagai Undaakkuven; Avar Un Thalaiyai Nasukkuvaar, Nee Avar Kudhingaalai Nasukkuvaai Endraar.

16 avar Sthreeyai Nokki: Nee Garppavadhiyaayirukkumpodhu Un Vedhanaiyai Migavum Perugappannuven; Vedhanaiyode Pillai Peruvaai; Un Aasai Un Purushanaip Patriyirukkum, Avan Unnai Aandukolluvaan Endraar.

17 pinbu Avar Aadhaamai Nokki: Nee Un Manaiviyin Vaarththaikku Sevikoduththu, Pusikkavendaam Endru Naan Unakku Vilakkina Virutchaththin Kaniyaip Pusiththapadiyinaale, Boomi Un Nimiththam Sabikkappattirukkum; Nee Uyirodirukkum Naalellaam Varuththaththode Adhin Palanaip Pusippaai.
18 adhu Unakku Mullum Kurukkum Mulaippikkum; Veliyin Payirvagaigalaip Pusippaai.
19 nee Boomiyilirundhu Edukkappattapadiyaal, Nee Boomikkuth Thirumbumattum Un Mugaththin Vervaiyaal Aagaaram Pusippaai; Nee Mannaayirukkiraai, Mannukkuth Thirumbuvaai Endraar.
20 aadhaam Than Manaivikku Evaal Endru Perittaan; Enenil, Aval Jeevanullorukkellaam Thaayaanaval.
21 dhevanaagiya Karththar Aadhaamukkum Avan Manaivikkum Thol Udaigalai Undaakki Avargalukku Uduththinaar.

22 pinbu Dhevanaagiya Karththar: Idho, Manushan Nanmai Theemai Ariyaththakkavanaai Nammil Oruvaraippol Aanaan; Ippozhudhum Avan Than Kaiyai Neetti Jeevavirutchaththin Kaniyaiyum Pariththu, Pusiththu, Endraikkum Uyirodiraadhapadikku Seyyavendum Endru,
23 avan Edukkappatta Mannaip Panpaduththa Dhevanaagiya Karththar Avanai Edhen Thottaththilirundhu Anuppivittaar.
24 avar Manushanaith Thuraththivittu, Jeevavirutchaththukkup Pom Vazhiyaik Kaavalseyya Edhen Thottaththukkuk Kizhakke Keroobeengalaiyum, Veesikkondirukkira Sudarolip Pattayaththaiyum Vaiththaar.
